name: Ready, Steady, Go!f
description:
🎵Smack ball with stick, but ya must go quick. It's Ready, Steady, Golf! 🎵

Made for Speedrun Game Jam in under 24hrs

Get puttin' in this fast-paced mini-golf experience.
Beat the par or gotta go fast? It's all about your technique.

Features:

  • Speedy ball action
  • Sick tunez
  • "Many" Levels

Controls

  • Left-Click to hit ball (hold for more power!)

POST YOUR FASTEST TIMES IN THE COMMENTS!
Don't mind the bugs ;)

Credits:

  • Grass Terrain Texture - (athile) https://opengameart.org/content/seamless-grass-texture-ii
  • Golf Ball Model - (jpsweber) https://opengameart.org/content/golf-ball
  • ReadOnlyAttribute - (MattRix)  https://gist.github.com/MattRix/9fb45606bfbc16254641e4d462117737
